underlying_goal: User wanted to clarify the status of a formatting bug mentioned in a presentation and update the slides accordingly.
primary_success: Quickly investigated and clarified the status of a known bug, confirming that while one experiment was invalid, a subsequent one was valid. It then updated the presentation to remove confusing and outdated information.
brief_summary: User inquired about a formatting bug mentioned in a presentation. Claude investigated and confirmed that an older 'embedding entropy' run was invalid, but a newer 'categorical entropy' run was valid. It then updated the slides to only show the valid results and removed the confusing appendix about the bug.
